attributes.action: FOR A BANKHOLIDAY IN OCTOBER TO CELEBRATE THE EFFORTS OF ALL FRONTLINE WORKERS
attributes.additional_details:
In these exceptional times when over half of us are on lockdown and the rest are working on the front line to keep us all safe and supplied

It dawned on us all last night after taking part and listening to the applause for the frontline workers that it was amazing that so many where recognising so many

BECAUSE WE ARE ALL IN THIS TOGETHER

Of course, this will be over at some point and we are going to have to remember eternally the effort that these frontline people have put in
attributes.background:
CAN WE PLEASE SET IN MOTION THE CREATION OF ANOTHER NATIONAL/BANK HOLIDAY HOPEFULLY ON A FRIDAY IN LATE OCTOBER EVERY YEAR FROM 2020? 
TO REMEMBER THOSE WHO LOST THE FIGHT BUT ALSO THOSE WHO WON THE FIGHT TO SURVIVE AND OF COURSE THE FRONTLINE WORKERS THAT KEPT US SAFE AND SUPPLIED
